subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that local variables that never have their values changed are declared final. The check can be configured to also check that unchanged parameters are declared final.

subsection.name: Notes
subsection.p: When configured to check parameters, the check ignores parameters of interface methods and abstract methods.

tr.td: Control whether to check enhanced for-loop variable.
Control whether to check unnamed variables.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: To configure the check so that it checks local variables and parameters:

By default, this Check skip final validation on
Enhanced For-Loop.
Option 'validateEnhancedForLoopVariable' could be used to make Check to validate even variable from Enhanced For Loop.
An example of how to configure the check so that it also validates enhanced For Loop Variable is:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="FinalLocalVariable"> <property name="tokens" value="VARIABLE_DEF"/> <property name="validateEnhancedForLoopVariable" value="true"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.p: An example of how to configure check on local variables and parameters but do not validate loop variables:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="FinalLocalVariable"> <property name="tokens" value="VARIABLE_DEF,PARAMETER_DEF"/> <property name="validateEnhancedForLoopVariable" value="false"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
